campaigns.showcaseDescription: Donated over 1 million pairs of jeans in a single year, enough to clothe half of all US youth in homeless shelters.
Powered historic youth turnout by registering 118,706 new voters in 2018 alone.
Cleaned up 3.7 million cigarette butts to protect the planet.
Made and mailed 41,287 Happy Ramadan cards, which were distributed to every mosque in the US.
Donated 585,965 perido products to shelters in the first-ever national period product drive.
Created the largest crowdsourced LGBTQ+ ally guide.

memberHighlights.content: Caesar helped his grandma stay connected by teaching her emojis!
Jordyn and her friends donated 500 pairs of jeans to benefit a local homeless shelter.
memberHighlights.memberQuote: We love giving back to the community! It is a great way to contribute to an important cause.

memberHighlights.content: Zachary swabbed his cheek to join the national bone marrow registry.
memberHighlights.memberQuote: I ran a give a spit drive on my campus. This campaign is LITERALLY saving lives!!!

scholarshipWinners.content: Keyla shared a V-Day card with her s/o to give them the confidence to pursue their dreams.
scholarshipWinners.memberQuote: This campaign allowed me to understand how important it is to show the person I am with how much I’m appreciative of them.

scholarshipWinners.content: Darren scored a scholarship for adding tips to our crowdsourced stress-busting guide.
scholarshipWinners.memberQuote: I want to rest my head on my pillow at night knowing that I did the best I could to follow my calling of helping people.

scholarshipWinners.campaignTitle: Take Back the Prom: Outfit Donations
scholarshipWinners.content: Ricardo donated prom formal wear to make sure everyone could look and feel good at prom.
scholarshipWinners.memberQuote: This campaign is important to me because I believe that everyone should be able to have an amazing prom filled with great memories.
